entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as looking at a name and remembering something.

entities.name: andromeda
entities.description: Mentioned as having a burn, but not further described in this context.

entities.name: bellatrix black
entities.description: A dark witch who is connected to Rodolphus Lestrange and has allegiance to Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: rodolpheus lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix's husband, mentioned as being in Azkaban with his brother Rabastan and Barty Crouch Jr.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A character who is talking to Harry and providing information about Bellatrix and her family.

entities.name: barty crouch jr.
entities.description: Mentioned as being in Azkaban with Bellatrix and her husband Rodolphus.

entities.name: rabastan lestrange
entities.description: Rodolphus's brother, mentioned as being in Azkaban with his family.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: A dark wizard who is mentioned as having allegiance from Bellatrix Lestrange.

relationships.description: Harry remembers something about Bellatrix, but can't quite place it.
Sirius mentions Bellatrix and her family to Harry.
Bellatrix is married to Rodolphus Lestrange.
Barty Crouch Jr. is imprisoned in Azkaban.
Bellatrix has allegiance to Lord Voldemort.
